description: This Java source file defines the User entity class for a note management backend application. It includes fields for user identification, credentials, roles, and associated notes, along with relevant annotations for ORM mapping.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Entity representing application users with fields for ID, username, password hash, roles, and associated notes.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the user.

methods.name: getUsername
methods.description: Returns the username of the user.

methods.name: getPasswordHash
methods.description: Returns the hashed password of the user.

methods.name: getRoles
methods.description: Returns the roles assigned to the user.
